sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>package_private</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>global.LocationTrackingUtil</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>false</client_callable>
        <description/>
        <name>LocationTrackingUtil</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var LocationTrackingUtil = Class.create();
LocationTrackingUtil.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {},
    getDefaultLocationTrackingOption: function(enabled) {
        if (enabled)
            return 'manual';
        else
            return null;
    },
    getTimeInMinutes: function(durationString) { // format yyyy-DD-MM HH:mm:ss
        try {
            var num = durationString.getGlideObject().getNumericValue() / 1000 / 60;
            if (num < 1 || num > 1440)
                throw new Exception();

			return num;
        } catch (e) {
            throw e;
        }
    },
    type: 'LocationTrackingUtil'
};]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2022-09-26 14:22:07</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>a57293eb4f021110fc3ace4b43ce0b0f</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>11</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>LocationTrackingUtil</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Mobile Location Tracking" source="com.glide.sg.location.tracking">e1c9469c473e0210cd4e1ce4316d43a1</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_a57293eb4f021110fc3ace4b43ce0b0f</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2022-09-29 22:31:14</sys_updated_on>
    </sys_script_include>
</record_update>
